message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me there?
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $95?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $105, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $105 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $98, can you consider that?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $105, and you're still $7 away from that. I'm starting to think it's time to consider other options. I'll give you one last chance to meet me at $105, or I'll have to explore other buyers.
